Date: Monday, 6/2/1993
Subject: Progress of Matt Whisenant
Dear Sir,
Matt Whisenant has an ERA of 2.08 at AA Tulsa Drillers!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 6/15/1993
Subject: Progress of Aaron Fultz
Dear Sir,
Aaron Fultz is doing pretty good at A Port Charlotte Rangers!
He has an ERA of 3.70, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 6/22/1993
Subject: Kurt Abbott learns new position
Kurt Abbott has made noteable progress
learning his new position, First Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director
